info.title: Read information about a listbox popup in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAlabamaInListbox
setupScript.description: expands the combobox, and places focus on the first option in the listbox popup

user: With focus on an option in the listbox popup, read information about the listbox popup.
instructions.raw: With focus on an option in the listbox popup, read information about the listbox popup.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Role of the popup ('listbox') is conveyed
Name of the popup ('States') is conveyed
Text of the focused option in the popup ('Alabama') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (1) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (56) is conveyed
